GET A FREE TRIAL LICENSE KEY WHEN YOU SIGNUP!

Pastaable üçù ‚Äì COPY and PASTE Code with Ease

Pastaable (pronounced "PASTE-able", as in copy and paste, and "able" to make your coding life easier. And tribute to delicious pasta üçù and spaghetti code jokes).

Say goodbye to tedious CSS coding and hello to faster development with Pastaable. Convert any element to Tailwind CSS with a single click.
Easily copy any element from any website, including iframes, and convert it into usable code in seconds.

Recent Updates:
* v2.0.4: clear stylesheets memory, display stylesheet size
* v2.0.3: optimized cached stylesheets memory
* v2.0.2: update responsive media query
* v2.0.1:  Fix stylesheets loading loop
* v2.0.0: Rewrite converter to output HTML, CSS, JS separately ready for playground
* v1.0.19: Fix overly aggressive optimization
* v1.0.18: Add copy element CSS Styles box
* v1.0.17: Fix media query
* v1.0.16: Optimized output and media Query
* v1.0.15: Add recursive conversion option
* v1.0.14: UI copy selector, secure and validate license
* v1.0.13: Enabled media query
* v1.0.12: Enabled menu dragging for easier navigation
* v1.0.11: Enhanced CSS conversion by converting longhands to shorthands
* v1.0.10: New menu implementation for a more seamless experience
* v1.0.9: Reduce Tailwind Classes lengths and added tests for improved conversion
* v1.0.0: Finalized migration to new stack and published Firefox addon

How to Use?
    1. Click the extension icon. Enter your license key to login. (Refresh the page if highlight is not visible)
    2. Click on any element and select.
    3. Use arrow keys to navigate selection between parent, child element.
    4. Press "Enter" or click "Copy" button to copy.
